languages.text: "Скучный план. Космические волки воюют иначе. Но железным кэрлам Омниссии по плечу только такая трусливая стратегия, так что — добро".
"Your plan bores me. This is not the Space Wolves' way of war. But such cowardly strategies are the limit of the Omnissiah's cog-kaerls, so you have my approval."
languages.original_text: "Скучный план. Космические волки воюют иначе. Но железным кэрлам Омниссии по плечу только такая трусливая стратегия, так что — добро".

traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: “这个计划太无聊了，我们太空野狼可不是这么打仗的。不过，欧姆尼塞亚那些齿轮农奴估计只能执行这种懦弱的战术。好吧，我赞同你的计划。”
languages.original_text: "Your plan bores me. This is not the Space Wolves' way of war. But such cowardly strategies are the limit of the Omnissiah's cog-kaerls, so you have my approval."

traits.locale_text: “这个计划太无聊了，我们太空野狼可不是这么打仗的。不过，欧姆尼塞亚那些齿轮农奴估计只能执行这种懦弱的战术。好吧，我赞同你的计划。”
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: « Votre plan m'ennuie. Ce n'est pas l'idée que les Space Wolves se font de la guerre, mais comme on ne peut pas attendre mieux que des stratégies lâches de la part des technokaerls de l'Omnimessie, je suis contraint de donner mon approbation. »
languages.original_text: "Your plan bores me. This is not the Space Wolves' way of war. But such cowardly strategies are the limit of the Omnissiah's cog-kaerls, so you have my approval."

traits.locale_text: « Votre plan m'ennuie. Ce n'est pas l'idée que les Space Wolves se font de la guerre, mais comme on ne peut pas attendre mieux que des stratégies lâches de la part des technokaerls de l'Omnimessie, je suis contraint de donner mon approbation. »
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: 「つまらん計画だ。スペースウルフの戦い方ではない。しかし、このような卑怯な作戦は万機神のコグ・カールの限界だろうから、仕方なく受け入れよう」
languages.original_text: "Your plan bores me. This is not the Space Wolves' way of war. But such cowardly strategies are the limit of the Omnissiah's cog-kaerls, so you have my approval."

traits.locale_text: 「つまらん計画だ。スペースウルフの戦い方ではない。しかし、このような卑怯な作戦は万機神のコグ・カールの限界だろうから、仕方なく受け入れよう」
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: «Su plan me aburre. Así no guerreamos los Lobos Espaciales. Pero los engranakaerls del Omnissiah no se van a atrever a nada más arriesgado, así que tiene mi beneplácito».
languages.original_text: "Your plan bores me. This is not the Space Wolves' way of war. But such cowardly strategies are the limit of the Omnissiah's cog-kaerls, so you have my approval."

traits.locale_text: «Su plan me aburre. Así no guerreamos los Lobos Espaciales. Pero los engranakaerls del Omnissiah no se van a atrever a nada más arriesgado, así que tiene mi beneplácito».
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Euer Plan langweilt mich. Die Space Wolves führen nicht auf diese Weise Krieg. Aber solch feige Strategien sind die Grenzen der Zahnrad-Kaerls des Omnissiah, Ihr habt also meine Zustimmung."
languages.original_text: "Your plan bores me. This is not the Space Wolves' way of war. But such cowardly strategies are the limit of the Omnissiah's cog-kaerls, so you have my approval."

traits.locale_text: "Euer Plan langweilt mich. Die Space Wolves führen nicht auf diese Weise Krieg. Aber solch feige Strategien sind die Grenzen der Zahnrad-Kaerls des Omnissiah, Ihr habt also meine Zustimmung."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Planın içimi sıkıyor. Uzay Kurtları böyle savaşmaz. Yine de bu tarz korkak stratejiler, Hermesih'in dişli müstahdemlerinin kapasitesine yaraşır. Bu yüzden rızamı aldın."
languages.original_text: "Your plan bores me. This is not the Space Wolves' way of war. But such cowardly strategies are the limit of the Omnissiah's cog-kaerls, so you have my approval."
